statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.87}+{8.35}\right)}={26.44}\approx{26.44}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.35}\cdot{4.81}={40.1635}\approx{40.2}.
